Html: Any support for table styles yet? Specifically accessing the ones already templated in Excel...?

I believe maartenba and markbaker are slowly approaching some of the graphical features in Excel. So they may be thinking about table styles too.

I have posted a feature request for monitoring this, but I believe it is very complicated to solve.
